name: KEEXS Classic 3.0
description: This Sneaker Art draws inspiration from works of the legendary Lemi Ghariokwu, a Nigerian artist and designer who is most renowned for providing many of the original cover images for the recordings of Fela Kuti!

reviews.title: I could not be more happier!
reviews.text: super comfortable..and good style!

reviews.title: robust shoes with good design.
reviews.text: Shoes fit great, look good and feel like they will last.

reviews.title: just wow.
reviews.text: I’m sooooooo impressed with these shoes. KEEXS has always been my favorite brand but without being able to try them on at the store, I was skeptical of the fit. These are by far THE MOST comfortable shoes. I work in a prison on concrete floors and these give my great support. I’ll be ordering more for sure!

reviews.title: the box was in bad condition,shoes remain untouched .
reviews.text: My son wears a size 15 and was in need of white sneakers. I was not so happy with the delivery but  these sneakers are great and fit him well.Thank you

reviews.title: fantastico!
reviews.text: He comprado para mi y mi hijo Komara diversos diseño de calzado de esta marca , fantastico.

name: Hesey Unisex
description: it is a Nigerian fashion brand,They designed this sneaker to be unisex and custom made to size.

reviews.title: shoe dear to my heart.
reviews.text: this is my new favourite sneaker...it is flexible and has good quality.

reviews.title: my dream shoes come true.
reviews.text: I  want a crisp pair of white, stylish, comfortable, and durable shoes. This is almost the perfect pair.

reviews.title: fair price and good quality.
reviews.text: I am very pleased with these shoes for the price paid and also the quality.

reviews.title: these shoes are invincible.
reviews.text: I've walked/jogged in these almost every day for the 2 weeks I've had them.So far So good,they fit well and they feel good.

reviews.title: Buy them..you would not regret.
reviews.text: the quality of the material is very good, and also the comfort it gives to the feet, the design is excellent. they are light, I definitely recommend them... I would buy them again..

reviews.title: I recommend them for everyone looking for comfort.
reviews.text: I discarded my other shoes, I just felt that I should JUST DO IT. This pair is very comfortable.

reviews.title: they make my feet sweety..and smell bad.
reviews.text: These shoes are  lightweight, but not made of breathable material, keeping my feet sweety.

reviews.title: buy them for the mars design on them.
reviews.text: shoes make you land to MARS!Elon Musk is proud.

name: Robson Kodiak
description: The Robson is made to withstand tough environments. These durable waterproof boots are treated with 3M Scotchgard and feature the highly abrasion resistant CORDURA ballistic nylon shell

reviews.title: Masterpiece..combines whatever you wish in a shoes.
reviews.text: A masterpiece and does not only look like fun, it really is..The boot overall is very comfortable and falls between a traditional work boot and a sneaker

reviews.title: Robust but a bit heavy.
reviews.text: They look classy and I can wear them casually with my jeans or semi-formally with khakis to work.

reviews.title: my son loved them.
reviews.text: They are a really nice looking shoe, but also surprisingly comfortable. They are not light weight, yet don't feel cheap. Even my son was impressed by the look of the shoe, and you know how young folk are about their shoes!

reviews.title: unreal shoes,simply awesome.
reviews.text: Fantastico..felt strange wearing them at first,but everyone falls in love with them,specially the design.

name: abyssinian PURE mSh
description: Slip-on shoes featuring a super soft hand-spun and hand-loomed cotton upper with beautiful hand-stitching, a cotton-lined interior for maximum comfort, and capped off with our signature recycled tire sole.

reviews.title: the cutton inside really warms my feet.
reviews.text: remarkably comfortable..and super soft!

reviews.title: Love'em.
reviews.text: So far, I’m liking these shoes quite a lot. They’re understated but not too much like a slipper, so I can wear them to class or around town casually.

reviews.title: For anyone with sensitive skin.
reviews.text: Fit right, comfortable. Inexpensive compared to similar brands and same style. If they last a couple of years I’ll be delighted.

reviews.title: inside feather makes it a plus.
reviews.text: Love them and the color.

reviews.title: i am simply in love..man..they r good.
reviews.text: I really like the casual look of these shoes. Also pretty comfy for low cost footwear. I would buy again in a heartbeat!

reviews.title: can wear both in cold and summer.
reviews.text: These shoes are keeping my feet warm and soft.

name: NKRUMAHS BLUE
description: The Nkrumah is a deconstructed take on a classic mid-cut that's designed for comfort and versatility. Made from Premium Full grain leather.

reviews.title: comfortable on feet.
reviews.text: I just love it!

reviews.title: the service and the quality are great.
reviews.text: Fit well, sharp looking and fast service.....

reviews.title: son is in love with these shoes.
reviews.text: My son loved them! He's in middle school & gets best dressed often. My little fashion guy. Lucked up & found these much cheaper than the mall.

reviews.title: cheap compared to local stores.
reviews.text: My 13 year old so picked these out online and loves them. We went to several stores looking for sneakers and couldn’t find any he liked. These fit well and look great. I like that they’re leather and will most likely last longer than others he’s had with nylon covering.

reviews.title: happy yet not well packaged.
reviews.text: happy,fit perfect ,good early delivery,not well packaged ,thankyou 😊

name: LUMUMBA BLACK
description: One of Enzi original designs,it is a premium upgrade to a timeless classic sneaker. Ethically handcrafted in Ethiopia from full-grain leather and perforated suede.

reviews.title: Enzi is my favourite band now.
reviews.text: I adore its design and its softness!

reviews.title: So far... so good.
reviews.text: I’ve worn these almost daily. Still LOVE them. My mom asked me if they make my feet stink (they don’t!) I ordered a pair of Sanuks around the same time and tried them on... returned immediately because they were way too tight and uncomfortable.I will buy another pair of these shoes ASAP!

reviews.title: had little dirt on them.
reviews.text: I love LUMUMBA! They're comfy and make my feet happy!but they come in a bit dirty..I had to wash them.
